ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-03-02 10:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-03-02 10:10:00
Category I activation for 28-year-old male. Intentional GSW.
Assault victim. Intentional violent mechanism confirmed. Age 28.
Stab wound and associated GSW. Assaulted by multiple individuals.
BP 96/60, HR 118, RR 22, GCS 14.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-03-02 10:30:00
Patient alert and able to participate in assessment.
Cognitive status documented: oriented and communicative.
Patient cooperative with care team.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-03-02 16:00:00
Post-operative day 1. Patient stable and conversant.
No mental health screening performed during admission.
No assessment initiated prior to planned discharge.
Screening not performed. Patient discharged without
mental health evaluation. No screening completed before discharge.
